analysisEngineMetaData.name: PAD_Hit
analysisEngineMetaData.description: Uses PADTerm and PADLocation annotation to create a PADHit.

configurationParameter.name: DISTANCE
configurationParameter.description: Specifies the number of annotations (of type specified in ANNOTATION_TYPE parameter) to define a text span that can contain the NEs that would comprise a hit

configurationParameter.name: DISTANCE_ANN_TYPE
configurationParameter.description: Specifies the annotation type that is used to define window(text span)

configurationParameter.name: ANNOTATION_PART_ONE_OF_PAIR
configurationParameter.description: Defines one of the annotations that make a pair to be considered as a hit - unless the dictionary hit is defined as standalone

configurationParameter.name: ANNOTATION_PART_TWO_OF_PAIR
configurationParameter.description: Defines one of the annotations that make a pair to be considered as a hit - unless the dictionary hit is defined as standalone

configurationParameter.name: BOUNDARY_ANN_TYPE
configurationParameter.description: Identifies the annotation type that defines boundary across which annotations cannot be paired. An example for boundary annotation type could be Segment.

configurationParameter.name: BACKUP_BOUNDARY_ANN_TYPE
configurationParameter.description: This annotation type should either be Segment annotatation, Document or any other enclosing annotation type that will be used in case the annotation specified in BOUNDARY_ANN_TYPE is not present, by default this uses segment annotation.

configurationParameter.name: ANNOTATION_PART_ONE_FILTEROUT_NEGATED
configurationParameter.description: Specifies whether the AE should filter out dictionary hits before considering for pairing. Default value is true - to filter out negated

configurationParameter.name: ANNOTATION_PART_TWO_FILTEROUT_NEGATED
configurationParameter.description: Specifies whether the AE should filter out dictionary hits before considering for pairing. Default value is true - to filter out negated

configurationParameter.name: ANN_PART_ONE_TYPES_TO_IGNORE
configurationParameter.description: type ids to be ignored from being considered

configurationParameter.name: ANN_PART_TWO_TYPES_TO_IGNORE
configurationParameter.description: type ids (as specified in the csv dictionary) to be ignored from bing marked as hits.
